title: Space Heroes
description: Captain Ryan and the crew of the Dauntless explore space and find new civilizations.
quote: Gentlemen, I have a bold and daring plan. There’s no time for hesitation. My orders must be carried out without question!
alt2: Dr. Mindstrong and Crankshaw jump out of the way as two crew members get zapped
alt3: Captain Ryan kissing a blue woman, Hypnotica
alt4: the ship’s bridge being overrun with fluffy pink Trumplets
